macro.name: VIX Index
macro.note: VIX at 17.89 (2025-11-13 4:00 PM EST). Heightened complacency is a risk factor at this level.

macro.name: Gold price (GLD proxy)
macro.note: Gold (GLD) at $385.99. Signals extreme flight to safety or high inflation expectations.
macro.action: Maintain gold position as a core hedge; reduce risk assets.

macro.name: WTI crude oil ($/bbl)
macro.note: WTI Crude at $58.99/bbl. Low price indicates global slowdown or demand weakness.

macro.name: AUD/USD exchange rate
macro.note: AUDUSD at 0.6554. Stable, suggesting moderate risk appetite.

macro.name: US 3yr treasury yield
macro.note: Yield at 3.56%. Normal short-term rate environment.

macro.name: US 30yr treasury yield
macro.note: Yield at 4.71%. Elevated long-term yields reflecting fiscal risk/inflation concerns.
macro.action: Watch the 5.0% threshold. Limit long duration locks.

macro.name: US 10yr treasury yield
macro.note: Yield at 4.13%. Normal long-term rate environment.

macro.name: High yield OAS (bps)
macro.note: HY OAS at 302 bps. Spreads are tight. Indicates low corporate default risk.

macro.name: Treasury net liquidity
macro.note: Net Liquidity at $6571785B. Liquidity is robust and supportive of risk assets.

macro.name: Fiscal integrity/debt risk
macro.note: Fiscal Score is at 25. Risk is manageable based on current data.
macro.action: Monitor VIX and SNAP data closely.

macro.name: Bank CDS (AAA Proxy, bps)
macro.note: Bank CDS at 5 bps. Low implied banking stress.

micro.name: S&P 500 index
micro.note: S&P 500 Index at 6,851. Strong market momentum.

micro.name: ASX 200 index
micro.note: ASX 200 Index at 8,753. Stable price action.

micro.name: FINRA Margin Debt YOY %
micro.note: Margin Debt YOY at 32.9% (FINRA Data, Oct 2025, Not Seasonally Adjusted). Leverage is expanding aggressively. High risk of forced liquidation if markets fall.
micro.action: Aggressively deleverage equity exposure; increase cash.

micro.name: Small/Large Cap Ratio (RUT/SPX)
micro.note: Small/Large Cap ratio at 0.3577. Severe small-cap underperformance. Recessionary signal/high risk-off sentiment.
micro.action: Avoid small-cap exposure entirely. Favour high-quality large-caps.

micro.name: Put/Call Ratio (PCCE)
micro.note: PCEE Ratio at 0.50. Low hedging (call-buying dominance). High complacency/bullish sentiment.
micro.action: Implement small hedges; avoid chasing market highs.

micro.name: SOFR OIS Spread (bps)
micro.note: SOFR/OIS spread is 5.0 bps. Dollar funding market is stable.

micro.name: Credit card delinquencies
micro.note: Delinquency Rate at 305.0 bps. Rate is elevated. Caution on consumer lending quality.
micro.action: Monitor consumer discretionary sector; review financial sector exposure.

overall.comment: Caution warranted; mixed signals dominating market trends.
